title: Change Women empowerment section paragraph text to black on Home page

requirements.summary: Update the “Empowering Women Through Griha Mahila Udyog” section on the Home page so its paragraph/body text renders in black instead of white, without affecting other sections.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, the paragraph text in the “Empowering Women Through Griha Mahila Udyog” section is black (not white).
No other sections on the Home page have their text colors changed.
The change is implemented via Tailwind/CSS classes in `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx` (e.g., removing/replacing `text-white` and `prose-p:text-white` within that section).

file_operations.description: Within the “Griha Mahila Udyog” section only, replace the section subtitle paragraph Tailwind class `text-white` with a black text class (e.g., `text-black`) and replace the prose body override `prose-p:text-white` with a black text override (e.g., `prose-p:text-black`), ensuring no other Home page section styles are altered.
